Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/1/1990 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Traded from Atlanta to St. Louis on 7/5/1990 (Going to ATL: P Dennis Martinez, SS Terry Pendleton, P Mike Hartley. Going to STL: P Cecilio Guante, P Graeme Lloyd, C Javy Lopez)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/12/1991, off Orel Hershiser (LAD)...
